overview: RIZIN Trigger at the Kobe World Memorial Hall. Surging Featherweight contenders Shoji Maruyama and Kyohei Hagiwara headline the first event of the TRIGGER series. A flyweight showdown between ZST Champion Saomoto and GRACHAN Champion Matsuba announced. Grand Prix participant Shian and former Shooto title challenger Uoi Fullswing clash in Bantamweight tilt.
title: RIZIN Trigger 1st
